testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
All the printed lines should be equal to lines in the example. Make sure, that you've not ignored whitespaces at the beginning and at the end of each line
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test.
---
_______ < hello > ------- ^__^ / _______/(oo) / /\/\( /(__) | w----|| || ||
